mapper.select: SELECT reserved_seats FROM MOVIE_RESERVATIONS WHERE showtime_id = #{ showtimeId } AND reservation_status = 'CONFIRMED'

SELECT r.reservation_code, u.name AS customer_name, u.phone, m.title AS movie_title, c.cinema_name, TO_CHAR(s.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS start_time, r.reserved_seats, r.total_amount, r.reservation_status, r.reservation_movie_poster_url, m.rating_age FROM MOVIE_RESERVATIONS r JOIN MOVIE_USERS u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN MOVIE_SHOWTIMES s ON r.showtime_id = s.showtime_id JOIN MOVIE_MOVIES m ON s.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN MOVIE_CINEMAS c ON s.cinema_id = c.cinema_id WHERE r.reservation_code = #{ reservationCode }
